text:
After working with Microsoft support I now know the source of the issue. The ESU
key that our VAR gave is a standard MAK key. Need to go back to the VAR to get
us the correct ESU key 
<

metadata.subject: Re: [EXTERNAL] [patchmanagement] Windows Server 2012 R2 ESU Issue
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from roger.padilla@ucsb.edu. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
After working with Microsoft support I now know the source of the issue. The ESU
key that our VAR gave is a standard MAK key. Need to go back to the VAR to get
us the correct ESU key 
<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><> 
Roger Padilla, Jr., CISSP 
Senior Systems Engineer 
Unit Information Security Lead 
Information Technology Services 
UC Santa Barbara
805.893.4863 [tel:805.893.4863]
Roger.padilla@ucsb.edu
<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>
